item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 2, 2025 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:

5. New battery-free technology can power devices using ambient RF signals (7 points | 1 comment)

10. Why do we have both CSRF protection and CORS? (11 points | discuss)
11. The early days of Linux (2023) (408 points | 109 comments)

14. The most unhinged video wall, made out of Chromebooks (532 points | 53 comments)

23. Show HN: Berlin Swapfest – Electronics flea market (288 points | 59 comments)
24. I struggled with Git, so I'm making a game to spare others the pain (67 points | 73 comments)
25. Firefly Blue Ghost Mission 1 Lunar Landing (176 points | 36 comments)
26. Crossing the uncanny valley of conversational voice (343 points | 178 comments)
27. Show HN: Recommendarr – AI Driven Recommendations Based on Sonarr/Radarr Media (14 points | 8 comments)

30. Trust in Firefox and Mozilla Is Gone – Let's Talk Alternatives (201 points | 162 comments)
